title.rendered: LIC Housing Finance Limited joins hands with Smile Foundation to support Education for the underprivileged children

content.rendered:
LIC Housing Finance Limited joins hands with Smile Foundation to support Education for the underprivileged children

LIC Housing Finance Limited has joined hands with Smile Foundation to support Education for the underprivileged children. Through their support the infrastructure of 7 government schools are being upgraded in Kaman, Rajasthan. The availability of proper infrastructure, proper desks and benches and good classroom provide motivation to the children who often come from weaker sections of he society devoid of any facilities, to do better in school

LIC Housing Finance Limited is one of the largest Housing Finance Mortgage loan companies in India having its Registered and Corporate office at Mumbai. LIFE INSURANCE CORPORATION OF INDIA holds founder, promoter & controller status. LIC HFL is associate/subsidiary company of LIC of India.
